about_the_game:
Silent Frontiers: A Gripping 2D Side-Scrolling Strategy Tower Defense Extravaganza. In this forgotten frontier, you become the final line of defense for your city, warding off relentless hordes of monstrous invaders. This is not just a battle for survival; it's a supreme test of wit and strategy.

As the campaign unfolds, meticulously plan the growth of your city, utilizing scarce resources to drive a technological revolution, transforming rudimentary defenses into impregnable fortresses. Each upgrade represents not only a surge in power but also a leap in strategic depth.

Amidst mounting pressure, skillfully deploy your troops and harness unique skill combinations to construct an impenetrable line of defense. Whether deploying skills or positioning combat units, every decision counts, directly influencing the tide of war.

Silent Frontiers demands not just construction but innovation – finding hope amidst despair and illuminating the path forward with wisdom. In this world brimming with uncertainty and challenge, you are both architect and guardian of your city, guiding your people towards the light or risking their fall into the abyss of darkness.

Prepare yourself to step into Silent Frontiers, where in this contest of intellect and bravery, you'll prove your strategic prowess by safeguarding these silent frontiers until the very end.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10,windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 560 series or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Jump into a 2D side-scroller tower defense that's easy to pick up but hard to master. Develop, upgrade, build, and customize troops to defend your territory. Blend strategy and creativity to forge your unique defenses and guard the border.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
